AcceptInvitation.name: AcceptInvitation
AcceptInvitation.description: Grants permission to accept an Amazon Macie membership invitation

ArchiveFindings.name: ArchiveFindings
ArchiveFindings.description: Grants permission to archive one or more findings

BatchGetCustomDataIdentifiers.name: BatchGetCustomDataIdentifiers
BatchGetCustomDataIdentifiers.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about one or more custom data identifiers

CreateClassificationJob.name: CreateClassificationJob
CreateClassificationJob.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for a classification job

CreateCustomDataIdentifier.name: CreateCustomDataIdentifier
CreateCustomDataIdentifier.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for a custom data identifier

CreateFindingsFilter.name: CreateFindingsFilter
CreateFindingsFilter.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for a findings filter

CreateInvitations.name: CreateInvitations
CreateInvitations.description: Grants permission to send an Amazon Macie membership invitation

CreateMember.name: CreateMember
CreateMember.description: Grants permission to associate an account with an Amazon Macie master account

CreateSampleFindings.name: CreateSampleFindings
CreateSampleFindings.description: Grants permission to create sample findings

DeclineInvitations.name: DeclineInvitations
DeclineInvitations.description: Grants permission to decline Amazon Macie membership invitations

DeleteCustomDataIdentifier.name: DeleteCustomDataIdentifier
DeleteCustomDataIdentifier.description: Grants permission to delete a custom data identifier

DeleteFindingsFilter.name: DeleteFindingsFilter
DeleteFindingsFilter.description: Grants permission to delete a findings filter

DeleteInvitations.name: DeleteInvitations
DeleteInvitations.description: Grants permission to delete Amazon Macie membership invitations

DeleteMember.name: DeleteMember
DeleteMember.description:
Grants permission to delete the association between an Amazon Macie master account
                                                and an account

DescribeBuckets.name: DescribeBuckets
DescribeBuckets.description:
Grants permission to retrieve statistical and other data about S3 buckets that Amazon
                                                Macie monitors and analyzes

DescribeClassificationJob.name: DescribeClassificationJob
DescribeClassificationJob.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the status and settings for a classification
                                                job

DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration
DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Macie configuration settings
                                                for an AWS organization

DisableMacie.name: DisableMacie
DisableMacie.description:
Grants permission to disable an Amazon Macie account, which also deletes Macie resources
                                                for the account

DisableOrganizationAdminAccount.name: DisableOrganizationAdminAccount
DisableOrganizationAdminAccount.description:
Grants permission to disable an account as a delegated administrator of Amazon Macie
                                                for an AWS organization

DisassociateFromMasterAccount.name: DisassociateFromMasterAccount
DisassociateFromMasterAccount.description:
Grants an Amazon Macie member account with permission to disassociate from its master
                                                account

DisassociateMember.name: DisassociateMember
DisassociateMember.description:
Grants an Amazon Macie master account with permission to disassociate from a member
                                                account

EnableMacie.name: EnableMacie
EnableMacie.description:
Grants permission to enable and specify the configuration settings for a new Amazon
                                                Macie account

EnableOrganizationAdminAccount.name: EnableOrganizationAdminAccount
EnableOrganizationAdminAccount.description:
Grants permission to enable an account as a delegated administrator of Amazon Macie
                                                for an AWS organization

GetBucketStatistics.name: GetBucketStatistics
GetBucketStatistics.description:
Grants permission to retrieve aggregated statistical data for all the S3 buckets that
                                                Amazon Macie monitors and analyzes

GetClassificationExportConfiguration.name: GetClassificationExportConfiguration
GetClassificationExportConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve the settings for exporting data classification results

GetCustomDataIdentifier.name: GetCustomDataIdentifier
GetCustomDataIdentifier.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the settings for a custom data identifier

GetFindingStatistics.name: GetFindingStatistics
GetFindingStatistics.description: Grants permission to retrieve aggregated statistical data about findings

GetFindings.name: GetFindings
GetFindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about one or more findings

GetFindingsFilter.name: GetFindingsFilter
GetFindingsFilter.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the settings for a findings filter

GetInvitationsCount.name: GetInvitationsCount
GetInvitationsCount.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the count of Amazon Macie membership invitations that
                                                were received by an account

GetMacieSession.name: GetMacieSession
GetMacieSession.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the status and configuration settings
                                                for an Amazon Macie account

GetMasterAccount.name: GetMasterAccount
GetMasterAccount.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Macie master account for
                                                an account

GetMember.name: GetMember
GetMember.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about an account that's associated with
                                                an Amazon Macie master account

GetUsageStatistics.name: GetUsageStatistics
GetUsageStatistics.description: Grants permission to retrieve quotas and aggregated usage data for one or more accounts

GetUsageTotals.name: GetUsageTotals
GetUsageTotals.description: Grants permission to retrieve aggregated usage data for an account

ListClassificationJobs.name: ListClassificationJobs
ListClassificationJobs.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the status and settings for one or
                                                more classification jobs

ListCustomDataIdentifiers.name: ListCustomDataIdentifiers
ListCustomDataIdentifiers.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all custom data identifiers

ListFindings.name: ListFindings
ListFindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve a subset of information about one or more findings

ListFindingsFilters.name: ListFindingsFilters
ListFindingsFilters.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all findings filters

ListInvitations.name: ListInvitations
ListInvitations.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about all the Amazon Macie membership invitations
                                                that were received by an account

ListMembers.name: ListMembers
ListMembers.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about all the accounts that are associated
                                                with an Amazon Macie master account

ListOrganizationAdminAccounts.name: ListOrganizationAdminAccounts
ListOrganizationAdminAccounts.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the delegated, Amazon Macie administrator
                                                account for an AWS organization

ListTagsForResources.name: ListTagsForResources
ListTagsForResources.description: Grants permission to retrieve the tags for an Amazon Macie resource or member account

PutClassificationExportConfiguration.name: PutClassificationExportConfiguration
PutClassificationExportConfiguration.description:
Grants permission to create or update the settings for exporting data classification
                                                results

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description:
Grants permission to add or update the tags for an Amazon Macie resource or member
                                                account

TestCustomDataIdentifier.name: TestCustomDataIdentifier
TestCustomDataIdentifier.description: Grants permission to test a custom data identifier

UnarchiveFindings.name: UnarchiveFindings
UnarchiveFindings.description: Grants permission to reactivate (unarchive) one or more findings

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon Macie resource or member account

UpdateClassificationJob.name: UpdateClassificationJob
UpdateClassificationJob.description: Grants permission to cancel a classification job

UpdateFindingsFilter.name: UpdateFindingsFilter
UpdateFindingsFilter.description: Grants permission to update the settings for a findings filter

UpdateMacieSession.name: UpdateMacieSession
UpdateMacieSession.description:
Grants permission to suspend or re-enable an Amazon Macie account, or update the configuration
                                                settings for a Macie account

UpdateMemberSession.name: UpdateMemberSession
UpdateMemberSession.description:
Grants an Amazon Macie master account with permission to suspend or re-enable a member
                                                account

UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration
UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update Amazon Macie configuration settings for an AWS organization
